feed.title: My Tech Blog
feed.subtitle: A whole heap of tech talk

entry.title: Welcome to my tech blog!
entry.content:
This is my blog which will be about a whole heap of tech stuff! From linux to programming to web development to networking!

I will be adding posts to this blog as time allows because I am also working ;).

I’ll be covering topics that I find particularly interesting. For example, I’m currently learning a lot about C++ programming so I might write some posts about my progress!
entry.summary: This is my blog which will be about a whole heap of tech stuff! From linux to programming to web development to networking! I will be adding posts to this blog as time allows because I am also working ;). I’ll be covering topics that I find particularly interesting. For example, I’m currently learning a lot about C++ programming so I might write some posts about my progress!
